item.title: Deep Dive: Suicide Crisis Syndrome
item.description: There are many methods of screening for suicide risk. The idea of the Suicide Crisis Syndrome appeals to me. It argues that depression or anxiety don’t explain all suicide experiences.

item.title: Deep Dive: emotional PPE; stressors and suicide; pain and mindfulness; kindness; COVID
item.description: In this week’s Deep Dive, we talk about emotional PPE; stressors and suicide; pain and mindfulness; kindness; and, COVID
